reference.shortdesc: The bookabstract element references a topic that includes a brief summary of the book content.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The bookabstract element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how a bookabstract element can be added to the front matter to provide a book summary:
example.codeblock: <bookmap xml:lang="en-us"> <booktitle> <booklibrary>Book library</booklibrary> <mainbooktitle>Book title</mainbooktitle> </booktitle> <!-- ... Book metadata here ... --> <frontmatter> <booklists> <toc/> <figurelist/> <tablelist/> </booklists> <bookabstract href="book-summary.dita"/> <preface href="preface.dita"></preface> </frontmatter> <!-- ... Book content followed by back matter ... --> </bookmap>
